alert.note: Alert for Adams (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 12:39PM EDT until May 27 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM EDT FOR EASTERN ADAMS COUNTY... At 1239 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hampton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hanover, Hampton, Littlestown, McSherrystown, Lake Meade, Bonneauville, New Oxford, East Berlin, Lake Heritage, Aspers, Biglerville and Abbottstown. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
